channel.title: Database on The imposter syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in Database on The imposter syndrome

item.title: To SQL or to NoSQL?
item.description: To SQL or to NoSQL? Is that the real question? Nah, the real war out there is to agree on how to pronounce it. Do you pronounce it “Ess-cue-ell” or maybe you pronounce it “sequel” like Bill Gates among others? If you want to know how I pronounce it… I use both just to bother people. Jokes aside, let’s get on this post! Would you like to know the differences between these two database models?
